reporting.eli5: Reporting is like a tool, checklist, or secret file that helps your IT team check, fix, or report what computers are doing.
reporting.boss: Reporting includes SCCM/MECM reporting, compliance, inventory, and role-based security tools used to monitor, manage, and audit enterprise environments.
reporting.sysadmin: Reporting refers to a reporting engine, query type, compliance rule, user role, or logging utility used to retrieve inventory, enforce policies, and troubleshoot endpoints in a managed environment.
reporting.use_case: An SCCM admin uses Reporting to generate reports, manage access, enforce baselines, or view logs for operational insight.
